summary:
ISSUES
Critical:
- How It Works Page Failed: Investigate and resolve the issues causing the failure of the How It Works page. Check for any broken links, server errors, or script issues that might be causing the page to fail.

issues.recommendation: Investigate and resolve the issues causing the failure of the How It Works page. Check for any broken links, server errors, or script issues that might be causing the page to fail.
Consider optimizing the homepage load time to improve user experience. Although the load time is not critically high, reducing it can enhance user engagement.

insights: Pricing and Blog Pages Perform Well: Both the Pricing and Blog pages have good load times and TTFB/FCP metrics, indicating efficient page rendering and resource management.
TTFB and FCP Metrics: The TTFB and FCP metrics for all pages are within acceptable ranges, suggesting that the server response time and initial content rendering are performing well.

One Failed Page: The failure of the How It Works page is a significant issue that needs immediate attention. Investigate and resolve the underlying problems to ensure consistent performance across all pages.
